name: Bullet Shooter
description:
BULLET SHOOTER

ONE MAN AGAINST TERRORIST ARMY AT WAR. YOU ARE THE BULLET SHOOTER COMMANDO.

SEE AND FEEL THE ACTION!
Experience the ultimate First person shooter with stunning console quality visuals, precise controls, advanced physics, destructible environments and full voiceovers. Jump into the heat of battle and push your device to the limit!

COMMAND AN ARSENAL OF DEADLY WEAPONS!
Take to the Line of Control with an array of classic weapons. Grab a historic rifle to take down enemies accurately or, if you prefer, a machine-gun to unleash a hail of bullets.
